verses.verse: Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O Israel: <S%H3478><s%> You are to pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> in to possess <S%H3423><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than yourself, cities <S%H5892><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and fenced <S%H1219><s%> up to heaven, <S%H8064><s%>

A people <S%H5971><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and tall, <S%H7311><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of the Anakims, <S%H6062><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you know, <S%H3045><s%> and of whom <S%H834><s%> you have heard <S%H8085><s%> say, Who <S%H4310><s%> can stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Anak! <S%H6061><s%>

Understand <S%H3045><s%> therefore this day, <S%H3117><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is he which goes <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; as a consuming <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> he shall destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, and he shall bring <S%H3665><s%> them down <S%H3665><s%> before your face: so shall you drive <S%H3423><s%> them out, and destroy <S%H6><s%> them quickly, <S%H4118><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H1696><s%> to you.

Speak <S%H559><s%> not you in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> after that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has cast <S%H1920><s%> them out from before <S%H6440><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> For my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has brought <S%H935><s%> me in to possess <S%H3423><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> land: <S%H776><s%> but for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> does drive <S%H3423><s%> them out from before <S%H6440><s%> you.

Not for your righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> or for the uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of your heart, <S%H3824><s%> do you go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> their land: <S%H776><s%> but for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> does drive <S%H3423><s%> them out from before <S%H6440><s%> you, and that he may perform <S%H6965><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

Understand <S%H3045><s%> therefore, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you not this <S%H2063><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it for your righteousness; <S%H6666><s%> for you are a stiff necked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> and forget <S%H7911><s%> not, how <S%H834><s%> you provoked the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> to wrath <S%H7107><s%> in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that you did depart <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you came <S%H935><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> you have been <S%H1961><s%> rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Also in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> you provoked the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to wrath, <S%H7107><s%> so that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with you to have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you.

When I was gone <S%H5927><s%> up into the mount <S%H2022><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> even the tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> with you, then I stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights, <S%H3915><s%> I neither <S%H3808><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> to me two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> with the finger <S%H676><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> them was written according to all <S%H3605><s%> the words, <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with you in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly. <S%H6951><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights, <S%H3915><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> me the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> even the tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Arise, <S%H6965><s%> get <S%H3381><s%> you down <S%H3381><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> from hence; <S%H2088><s%> for your people <S%H5971><s%> which you have brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> themselves; they are quickly <S%H4118><s%> turned <S%H5493><s%> aside out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them; they have made <S%H6213><s%> them a molten <S%H4541><s%> image.

Furthermore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is a stiff necked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

Let me alone, <S%H7503><s%> that I may destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, and blot <S%H4229><s%> out their name <S%H8034><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> heaven: <S%H8064><s%> and I will make <S%H6213><s%> of you a nation <S%H1471><s%> mightier <S%H6099><s%> and greater <S%H7227><s%> than they.

So I turned <S%H6437><s%> and came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and the mount <S%H2022><s%> burned <S%H1197><s%> with fire: <S%H784><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> were in my two <S%H8147><s%> hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> you had sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and had made <S%H6213><s%> you a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf: <S%H5695><s%> you had turned <S%H5493><s%> aside quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.

And I took <S%H8610><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tables, <S%H3871><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> them out of my two <S%H8147><s%> hands, <S%H3027><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> them before your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And I fell <S%H5307><s%> down before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as at the first, <S%H7223><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights: <S%H3915><s%> I did neither <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your sins <S%H2403><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you sinned, <S%H2398><s%> in doing <S%H6213><s%> wickedly <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to provoke him to anger. <S%H3707><s%>

For I was afraid <S%H3025><s%> of the anger <S%H639><s%> and hot <S%H2534><s%> displeasure, <S%H2534><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you to destroy <S%H8045><s%> you. But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to me at that time <S%H6471><s%> also. <S%H1571><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> angry <S%H599><s%> with Aaron <S%H175><s%> to have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> him: and I prayed <S%H6419><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> time. <S%H6256><s%>

And I took <S%H3947><s%> your sin, <S%H2403><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you had made, <S%H6213><s%> and burnt <S%H8313><s%> it with fire, <S%H784><s%> and stamped <S%H3807><s%> it, and ground <S%H2912><s%> it very <S%H3190><s%> small, <S%H3190><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> it was as small <S%H1854><s%> as dust: <S%H6083><s%> and I cast <S%H7993><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> thereof into <S%H413><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> that descended <S%H3381><s%> out of the mount. <S%H2022><s%>
And at Taberah, <S%H8404><s%> and at Massah, <S%H4532><s%> and at Kibrothhattaavah, <S%H6914><s%> you provoked the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to wrath. <S%H7107><s%>

Likewise when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> you from Kadeshbarnea, <S%H6947><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Go <S%H5927><s%> up and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you; then you rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and you believed <S%H539><s%> him not, nor <S%H3808><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to his voice. <S%H6963><s%>
You have been <S%H1961><s%> rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that I knew <S%H3045><s%> you.

Thus I fell <S%H5307><s%> down before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights, <S%H3915><s%> as I fell <S%H5307><s%> down at the first; because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> he would destroy <S%H8045><s%> you.

I prayed <S%H6419><s%> therefore to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> destroy <S%H7843><s%> not your people <S%H5971><s%> and your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> through your greatness, <S%H1433><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> your servants, <S%H5650><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> look <S%H6437><s%> not to the stubbornness <S%H7190><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> nor to their wickedness, <S%H7562><s%> nor to their sin: <S%H2403><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> from where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you brought <S%H3318><s%> us out say, <S%H559><s%> Because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was not able <S%H3201><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he promised <S%H1696><s%> them, and because he hated <S%H8135><s%> them, he has brought <S%H3318><s%> them out to slay <S%H4191><s%> them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

Yet they are your people <S%H5971><s%> and your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you brought <S%H3318><s%> out by your mighty <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and by your stretched <S%H5186><s%> out arm. <S%H2220><s%>
